name: Easy Baked Turkey Wings
author: Makenzie and Cy's mom
summary: My mom made this growing up and now my family loves it. It is very easy to make. Serve over rice or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place turkey wings and onion in a casserole dish; sprinkle seasoned salt, poultry seasoning, black pepper, and garlic on both sides of each wing
Pour 1/2 cup water into the casserole dish
Bake in the preheated oven until browned, 1 hour
Stir cream of mushroom soup and 1 cup water together in a bowl; pour over turkey wings into casserole dish and return to oven, uncovered
Continue baking until brown and tender, 1 hour
